name: Python (latest 3.12)
postStartCommand: . /workspaces/.venv/bin/activate && if ! pgrep -f 'mlflow ui' >/dev/null; then nohup mlflow ui --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --backend-store-uri sqlite:///mlflow.db >/tmp/mlflow.log 2>&1 & fi && grep -qxF 'source /workspaces/.venv/bin/activate' ~/.bashrc || echo 'source /workspaces/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc
